title: Batbat - Carmes
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vietnamese restaurant offering a vegetarian menu that can be made vegan, including pho soup or bo bun with tofu, or spring rolls or a che (dessert made with coco cream, tapioca, fruits and peanuts). A soy milkshake is also offered. Tea room in the afternoon.
